body_html: Is there really no way do auto-generate those tests? They're super repetitive, and no one can really tell if you've made a small mistake somewhere or not. It should be possible and quite easy to automatically build up envs composed of two functions of different kinds that call each other.

body: Is there really no way do auto-generate those tests? They're super repetitive, and no one can really tell if you've made a small mistake somewhere or not. It should be possible and quite easy to automatically build up envs composed of two functions of different kinds that call each other.
